SEARCH
Package com.app.service

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Interface for managing user-related operations such as user creation, activation, password management, and role changes. Provides methods for managing user accounts, including authentication, email updates, and password resets.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Long
    activateUser(UserTokenActivationDto userTokenActivationDto)
    Activates a user account using the provided token.

    Changes the email address of a user.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      Long createUser(CreateUserDto createUserDto)
      Creates a new user based on the provided user data.
      Parameters:
      createUserDto - the DTO containing the data for the new user
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly created user

    • init

      void init()
      Initializes the system by setting up initial configurations or data. This method is typically called during application startup.

    • activateUser

      Long activateUser(UserTokenActivationDto userTokenActivationDto)
      Activates a user account using the provided token.
      Parameters:
      userTokenActivationDto - the DTO containing the token for activation
      Returns:
      the ID of the activated user

    • refreshToken

      Long refreshToken(UserEmailRefreshToken userEmailRefreshToken)
      Refreshes a user's activation token based on the provided email.
      Parameters:
      userEmailRefreshToken - the DTO containing the user's email for token refresh
      Returns:
      the ID of the user associated with the refreshed token

    • changePassword

      Long changePassword(ChangePasswordDto changePasswordDto, String token)
      Changes the password of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      changePasswordDto - the DTO containing the current and new password data
      token - the token for user verification
      Returns:
      the ID of the user whose password was changed

    • changeRole

      Long changeRole(ChangeRoleDto changeRoleDto)
      Changes the role of a user.
      Parameters:
      changeRoleDto - the DTO containing the user ID and the new role to be assigned
      Returns:
      the ID of the user whose role was changed

    • lostPassword

      Long lostPassword(EmailDto emailDto)
      Handles a lost password scenario by sending a reset link to the user's email.
      Parameters:
      emailDto - the DTO containing the email address for the user who has lost their password
      Returns:
      the ID of the user requesting the password reset

    • newPassword

      Long newPassword(NewPasswordDto newPasswordDto)
      Sets a new password for a user who has requested a reset.
      Parameters:
      newPasswordDto - the DTO containing the new password data
      Returns:
      the ID of the user who updated their password

    • changeEmail

      Long changeEmail(EmailDto emailDto, String token)
      Changes the email address of a user.
      Parameters:
      emailDto - the DTO containing the new email address
      token - the token for user verification
      Returns:
      the ID of the user whose email was updated
